text:
Hi <@U07LB3YLSRG> , just wanted to know if there is any update on this.
I'm facing this issue few times where thread is not maintaining in HubSpot inbox.
Thanks for understanding
cc: <@U04B32JHTUZ>
hi! did you pass in a UUID as integrationthreadid, if you do that, then everything will work properly. feel free to DM me if the problem still persists.

So you mean when I send the first message, I should use a UUID(self-generated) in the `integrationThreadId` and then follow up with all the messages with this value in `integrationThreadId`, and everything should work properly?
